exercises.name: Cable Chest Press
instructions: Setup: Adjust cable handles to chest height, grab handles with palms facing down
Execution: Press handles forward until arms are fully extended, squeeze chest at the top
Form cue: Keep core tight and avoid arching your back

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown Machine
instructions: Setup: Adjust thigh pad to secure legs, grab bar with wide overhand grip
Execution: Pull bar down to upper chest, squeeze shoulder blades together
Form cue: Lean back slightly and avoid using momentum

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raises
instructions: Setup: Set cables to lowest position, grab handles with arms at your sides
Execution: Raise arms out to sides until parallel to floor, control the descent
Form cue: Keep slight bend in elbows and lift with your delts, not your traps

exercises.name: Cable Tricep Pushdowns
instructions: Setup: Attach rope or bar to high cable, stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Execution: Push weight down until arms are fully extended, squeeze triceps
Form cue: Keep elbows tucked at your sides throughout the movement

exercises.name: Cable Bicep Curls
instructions: Setup: Set cable to lowest position, grab bar with underhand grip
Execution: Curl weight up by flexing biceps, lower with control
Form cue: Keep elbows stationary and avoid swinging your body

exercises.name: Leg Press Machine
instructions: Setup: Sit in machine with back flat against pad, place feet shoulder-width apart on platform
Execution: Lower weight until knees reach 90 degrees, push through heels to return
Form cue: Keep knees aligned with toes and maintain steady tempo

exercises.name: Leg Curl Machine
instructions: Setup: Lie face down with pad positioned behind your ankles
Execution: Curl heels toward glutes by contracting hamstrings, lower slowly
Form cue: Keep hips pressed down and avoid lifting your torso

exercises.name: Leg Extension Machine
instructions: Setup: Sit with back against pad, position ankles behind the lower pad
Execution: Extend legs until fully straight, squeeze quads at top
Form cue: Control the weight down and avoid locking knees aggressively

exercises.name: Cable Hip Abductions
instructions: Setup: Attach ankle strap to low cable, stand sideways to machine
Execution: Lift leg out to the side against resistance, return with control
Form cue: Keep torso upright and focus on using your glutes

exercises.name: Calf Press on Leg Press
instructions: Setup: Position feet on lower portion of leg press platform, balls of feet on edge
Execution: Push through balls of feet to raise weight, lower with full stretch
Form cue: Get full range of motion and pause briefly at the top

exercises.name: Personal Training Session
instructions: Follow Josh's programming and guidance
Focus on form corrections and new movement patterns
Communicate any concerns or feedback during the session

exercises.name: Recumbent Bike
instructions: Setup: Adjust seat so legs have slight bend at full extension
Execution: Maintain steady pace at 60-70% max heart rate
Form cue: Keep shoulders relaxed and engage core throughout

exercises.name: Upper Body Stretching
instructions: Step 1: Chest doorway stretch - 30 seconds each arm
Step 2: Overhead tricep stretch - 30 seconds each arm
Step 3: Cross-body shoulder stretch - 30 seconds each arm
Step 4: Cat-cow stretches - 10 slow repetitions

exercises.name: Lower Body Stretching
instructions: Step 1: Standing quad stretch - 45 seconds each leg
Step 2: Seated hamstring stretch - 45 seconds each leg
Step 3: Figure-4 hip stretch - 45 seconds each side
Step 4: Calf stretch against wall - 45 seconds each leg

exercises.name: Foam Rolling
instructions: Step 1: Roll IT band and quads - 1 minute each leg
Step 2: Roll upper back and lats - 1 minute
Step 3: Roll glutes and piriformis - 1 minute
Form cue: Move slowly and pause on tight spots
